data_description.password: Not all devices provide CGI Endpoints. If so, the integration will fetch additional data. Leave empty if you have a CGI endpoint but no password auth
data_description.cgi: Fetch additional data from the CGI Endpoint (provides more sensors including energy totals, temperatures, voltages)
data_description.host_cgi: Host / IP for CGI Endpoint (leave empty to use Modbus host)
data_description.port: Port the Modbus server is listening on (default: 502)
data_description.scan_interval_modbus: Frequency of polling Modbus data in seconds (recommended: 3-10)
data_description.scan_interval_cgi: Frequency of polling CGI data in seconds (recommended: 10-60)

user.description: Configure your VARTA Storage connection. The integration provides Modbus sensors (real-time power data) and optional CGI sensors (energy totals, temperatures, voltages). Calculated sensors for efficiency and self-sufficiency rates are also included.

data_description.password: Not all devices provide CGI Endpoints. If so, the integration will fetch additional data. Leave empty if you have a CGI endpoint but no password auth
data_description.cgi: Fetch additional data from the CGI Endpoint (provides more sensors including energy totals, temperatures, voltages)
data_description.host_cgi: Host / IP for CGI Endpoint (leave empty to use Modbus host)
data_description.port: Port the Modbus server is listening on (default: 502)
data_description.scan_interval_modbus: Frequency of polling Modbus data in seconds (recommended: 3-10)
data_description.scan_interval_cgi: Frequency of polling CGI data in seconds (recommended: 10-60)

init.description: Configure your VARTA Storage integration settings. Lower scan intervals provide more responsive data but increase network traffic.
